name: Mokriya.com
overview:
Mokriya is a software design and development company specializing on Mobile Applications for a wide variety of smart phones and mobile computing devices including iphone, Android, BlackBerry and iPad.

Mokriya has been instrumental in bringing to the market a wide range of mobile applications that are based on location based services. Mokriya has built a niche in the GPS phone applications.

Whether you have a complete specification document that must be implemented or whether you have a simple idea of what you want in the Mobile application arena, you have found a partner in Mokriya that believes in relentless pursuit of wowing the customer.

Mokriya is ideally positioned to turn your ideas to successful Mobile Apps across multiple platforms. We can either take on building your Mobile Application end-to-end or partner with your organization’s existing technology and design resources to collaboratively build the application.

With decades of experience in software development industry from small startups to large enterprise software development companies, Mokriya’s team will bring thorough software development and design processes to the table.

Our developers have been instrumental in bringing to the market a wide range of mobile applications that are based on location based services.
